titleStmt.title: Brachy-martyrologia, or, A breviary of all the greatest persecutions which have befallen the saints and people of God from the creation to our present times paraphras'd by Nicholas Billingsly ...
titleStmt.author: Billingsley, Nicholas, 1633-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel for Tho. Johnson ...,

notesStmt.note: The second part (p. [141]-213) has a separate t.p.: A martyrologie containing a collection of all the persecutions which have befallen the Church of England, since the first plantation of the Gospel, to the end of Queen Maries reigne. Printed by J. Cottrel, 1657.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
